name: The Rockwall Show
description:
CONTROLS:
WASD to move
Left Mouse Button to interact with the world
Right Mouse Button to Zoom in

Credits:
Bjorn - Narrative
Dronaroid - Shaders, Art
Liliya Panina - Art, Level Design
Matthew Mark Ibbetson - Sound Design
Samuel Burnett, Desktoy - Code

Notes on assets:
Main Menu score was created before the jam.
Assets used from external marketplaces:
HQ Residential House
Renderpeople 3D Scanned People Pack
Dekogon Movie Props Vol.3
